entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 04:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: NNE 34 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Amount 25 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain this evening then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
